title: OANDA Prop Trader Check website
description: OANDA Prop Trader, based in Malta, was established in January 2024. It is a CFD firm offering a 2 Steps program and lists MT5 as its supported trading platform. User feedback is summarized with a review score of 4.2 out of 5 from 51 reviews. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
forbidden_strategies: News Trading window violation (2 mins before/after).

firm_rules.copy_trading: Not allowed between multiple accounts or within the OANDA Prop Trader program. Copying to non-OANDA accounts is permitted.
firm_rules.expert_advisor: Traders may use EAs, scripts, and indicators. EAs engaging in price/latency arbitrage prohibited.
firm_rules.news_trading: No opening or closing of trades within a 4-minute window (2 mins before/after major news).
firm_rules.weekend_holding: (Not explicitly mentioned as prohibited in main text, assuming standard allowed unless specified)
forbidden_strategies: News Trading window violation (2 mins before/after).

timeline.event: OANDA Prop Trader Challenges Exciting New Changes!

seo_content:
OANDA Prop Trader Technical Infrastructure

OANDA Prop Trader, based in Malta, was established in January 2024. It is a CFD firm offering a 2 Steps program and lists MT5 as its supported trading platform. User feedback is summarized with a review score of 4.2 out of 5 from 51 reviews. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
